page.title: 05GROVE RECREATION -SPORT
page.content: The sports that are played in Grove are football, cricket, rugby, athletics and bicycle motor cross (BMX). There are special clubs which people join to play their favourite sports. The football club is called Grove Challengers. Boys from 6 to 16 play in 7 age groups.Every year a team from Ireland visits.Badminton is played in the Further Education wing it is an indoor game a bit like Tennis. White Horse Harriers is the athletics club.They have recently had a 400 m running track built. There is a BMX track in Grove where people ride special bikes most sundays.The Rugby Club has its own clubhouse.Cricket is played in the summer.
